description: Provide access to the LittleSis API to track corporate power and accountability. Enable querying and exploring relationships and entities related to corporate influence. Facilitate integration of corporate data into LLM applications for enhanced context and insights.

capabilities.name: get_entity
capabilities.description: Get detailed information about a specific entity (person or organization) from LittleSis by ID

capabilities.name: get_entities
capabilities.description: Get information about multiple entities at once (up to 300 entities per request)

capabilities.name: search_entities
capabilities.description: Search for entities by name. Results are ranked by number of relationships.

capabilities.name: get_entity_extensions
capabilities.description: Get the types/extensions associated with an entity (Person, Organization, Business, etc.)

capabilities.name: get_entity_relationships
capabilities.description: Get all relationships this entity has with other entities

capabilities.name: get_entity_connections
capabilities.description: Get other entities that this entity has relationships with

capabilities.name: get_entity_lists
capabilities.description: Get the lists that an entity appears on (e.g., Fortune 1000, lobbying lists)

capabilities.name: get_relationship
capabilities.description: Get detailed information about a specific relationship between two entities
